b:if.cond: data:title != "{ads}" and not (data:widget.type == "HTML" and data:title contains "getMailchimp")

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:class.expr:name: data:skin.vars.gridstyle == "1px" ? "index-post grid1-item hentry post-" + data:i : "index-post list1-item hentry post-" + data:i

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "magspot-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "magspot-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

div.p: This gadget is no longer available.

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage or (data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.headerad == "1px"))) and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "header-ads")
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "ticker"))
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "featured"))

b:widget.title: Info Airdrop & Edukasi Crypto Terbaru | Web3 Indonesia (Header)

b:include.data: { buttonClass: "flat-button", limit: 1, items: data:this.data, itemSet: "data", itemsMarkup: "super.hierarchy" }
b:include.name: extendableItems

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Halo! Saya adalah penulis di Overking Real, sebuah blog yang membahas dunia crypto, khususnya info airdrop, TGE, dan panduan pemula. Blog ini bertujuan untuk membantu kamu menemukan peluang gratis di dunia Web3, serta memberikan edukasi agar terhindar dari scam airdrop. Terima kasih telah berkunjung!

b:section.cond: (data:view.isMultipleItems or data:view.isSingleItem or data:view.isError) and not (data:view.isHomepage and (data:skin.vars.blogposts == "0px"))
b:section.name: Main Posts

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:class.expr:name: data:skin.vars.gridstyle == "1px" ? "index-post grid1-item hentry post-" + data:i : "index-post list1-item hentry post-" + data:i

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "magspot-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "magspot-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "magspot-related-posts"))
b:section.name: Related Posts

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "magspot-post-footer-ads"))
b:section.name: Post ADS 3

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage or (data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.footerad == "1px"))) and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "footer-ads")
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:widgets.Image any w => w.sectionId == "magspot-about-section") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["footer-col-1","footer-col-2","footer-col-3"])
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["footer-col-1","footer-col-2","footer-col-3"])

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Halo! Saya adalah penulis di Overking Real, sebuah blog yang membahas dunia crypto, khususnya info airdrop, TGE, dan panduan pemula. Blog ini bertujuan untuk membantu kamu menemukan peluang gratis di dunia Web3, serta memberikan edukasi agar terhindar dari scam airdrop. Terima kasih telah berkunjung!
Our website uses cookies to improve your experience. Learn more
